2023-12-01.name: Holiday Fantasy in Lights
2023-12-01.summary: The free display in Olin Park is open from dusk to dawn.

2023-12-01.name: Holiday Lights Festival
2023-12-01.summary: The season-long lights festival includes more than 500,000 lights throughout downtown's parks and streets.

2023-12-01.name: Christkindlmarket
2023-12-01.summary: This is the most authentic Old World Christmas market, with many German vendors who bring over toys, ornaments and sweets. There's a Children's Lantern Parade, appearances by the Christkind and entertainment most days. In Daley Plaza in the Loop.

2023-12-01.name: Christkindlmarket Wrigleyville
2023-12-01.summary: This North Side satellite of the Daley Plaza Christkindlmarket features ice-skating, wreath-making, music and Santa's Workshop as well as holiday vendors.

2023-12-01.name: Bentleyville Tour of Lights
2023-12-01.summary:
Tour the retro-cool lighted decorations in Bayfront Festival Park, including a tree that dances to music, Dinosaurland and Penguin Park, and visit with Santa and Mrs. Claus.
There's free hot chocolate, cookies, popcorn and marshmallows to roast over fire pits. Bring cash or food to donate to food shelves.

2023-12-01.name: Christkindlmarket
2023-12-01.summary: This Christmas market in Principal Park, on the river confluence downtown, features vendors and food plus many performances by bands, choirs, carolers, fiddlers and dance troupes.

2023-12-01.name: European Christmas Market
2023-12-01.summary: This Christkindlmarkt in Union Depot features choirs, dancers, hot mulled wine, holiday beers,  European-inspired food and artisan goods.

2023-12-01.name: Christmas Walk and House Tour
2023-12-01.summary: In this northwest Illinois town, Santa Lucia arrives in a horse-drawn carriage on Friday and hands out Swedish cookies, then Santa lights the Great Tree and opens his Gingerbread House. There's shopping amid strolling carolers. A tour of five houses is Friday and Saturday.

2023-12-01.name: Holidazzle
2023-12-01.summary: This free holiday market in Loring Park, on the edge of downtown, features an artisan market, appearances by Santa and the illuminated Holidazzle Yeti, outdoor yoga, choirs, a beer garden and fireworks.

2023-12-21.name: Holiday Lights Festival
2023-12-21.summary: The season-long lights festival includes more than 500,000 lights throughout downtown's parks and streets.

2023-12-21.name: Christkindlmarket
2023-12-21.summary: This is the most authentic Old World Christmas market, with many German vendors who bring over toys, ornaments and sweets. There's a Children's Lantern Parade, appearances by the Christkind and entertainment most days. In Daley Plaza in the Loop.

2023-12-21.name: Christkindlmarket Wrigleyville
2023-12-21.summary: This North Side satellite of the Daley Plaza Christkindlmarket features ice-skating, wreath-making, music and Santa's Workshop as well as holiday vendors.

2023-12-21.name: Bentleyville Tour of Lights
2023-12-21.summary:
Tour the retro-cool lighted decorations in Bayfront Festival Park, including a tree that dances to music, Dinosaurland and Penguin Park, and visit with Santa and Mrs. Claus.
There's free hot chocolate, cookies, popcorn and marshmallows to roast over fire pits. Bring cash or food to donate to food shelves.
